name: Sprinklr
description: Sprinklr is an American software company based in New York City that develops a SaaS customer experience management (CXM) platform. he company's software, also called Sprinklr, combines different applications for social media marketing, social advertising, content management, collaboration, employee advocacy, customer care, social media research, and social media monitoring.

jobs.name: Front-End Product Engineer
jobs.description: As the world moves even more online due to the coronavirus pandemic, customers are connected and empowered like never before. Customers want an immediate, personalized and consistent experience, no matter which channel they choose to engage with a brand. f you are interested in creating a user-friendly environment by writing code and moving forward in your career, then this job is for you.

jobs.name: Back-End Product Engineer
jobs.description: Sprinklr is a Customer Experience Management (CXM) platform for modern enterprises with 2500+ employees helping the worldâ€™s most valuable enterprises make their customers happier. Build reusable code and libraries for future use.

comments.comment: This is an amazing company to work at, they are building the technology of the future. CXM is a rapidly growing field, and Sprinklr is dominating it at this stage itself.

name: UST Global
description: UST is a global provider of digital technology and transformation, IT services and solutions, headquartered in Aliso Viejo, California, United States. Stephen Ross founded UST in 1998 in Laguna Hills. The company has offices in the Americas, EMEA, APAC, and India. UST specializes in financial services, retail & CPG, manufacturing, technology, media and telecom, semiconductor, and the public sector.

jobs.name: Machine Learning Research Intern
jobs.description: Work on solving industry level Machine Learning Research problems using the latest cutting-edge algorithms.

comments.comment: In the Machine Learning area, UST global works on breakthrough research in industrial product areas. It is an amazing opportunity to work here. The office is huge and amazing, and free coffee !
The office is just so cool, it has a swimming pool and a gym on the terrace. There are immersive client meetings, amazing restaurants in the ground floor. The work environment is also great.

name: Composewell Technologies
description: Build high-performance, reliable and modular software with Haskell and Streamly. Build reliable and high-performance systems from modular building blocks using dataflow programming and declarative concurrency.

jobs.name: Software Engineering Intern
jobs.description: Contribute to develop and maintain an open-source library for Haskell which stresses on high-performance, optimization, concurrency and core technologies

name: Lyearn
description: Lyearn is a learning management system which empowers organisations to deliver a deeply engaging experience to their learners where they are, anytime, anywhere.

jobs.name: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: We want to empower everyone to teach better and learn better, with the technology that educate and upscale their lives.
